DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective chart review patient receive concurrent chemoradiotherapy oropharynx cancer perform compare clinical data patient treat prior initiation NP clinic subsequently see weekly NP clinic . The variable study include ; rate hospitalization , dose completion dose reduction . The result reveal overall improvement variable patient see weekly NP clinic . To analyze data randomize , prospective study propose validate finding retrospective study . It predict weekly NP lead clinic decrease costly hospitalization , increase patient treatment completion improve overall patient quality life satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Comparative Study Weekly Versus Every Other Week Nurse Practitioner-led Symptom Management Clinic Head Neck Cancer Patients Undergoing Concurrent Chemotherapy Radiation
DOC.criteria: Have diagnosis stage III IV HNC Are initiate concurrent chemotherapy radiation Are able willing sign inform consent Ages 18 year old ECOG ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ) score 0 1 ( The ECOG score attempt quantify cancer patient ' general wellbeing activity daily life ) Able read complete require survey Can provide informed consent Any medical psychiatric illness opinion principal investigator would compromise patient 's ability tolerate treatment .
